item.title: 新泽西州起诉 RealPage，称其与房东串通抬高租金
item.description: 新泽西州周三起诉物业管理软件公司 RealPage，指控其与该州一些大房东非法合谋抬高住宅租金。【原文：New Jersey sued the property management software company RealPage on Wednesday, accusing it of illegally conspiring with some of the state's largest landlords to drive up residential rents.】

item.title: Meta 向全球广告商开放 Threads
item.description: Meta Platforms 周三表示，它正在将其社交网络 Threads 上的广告扩展到全球所有符合条件的广告商，因为它希望在品牌关税的不确定性中创造新的收入来源。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Wednesday it is expanding advertising on its social network Threads to all eligible advertisers globally, as it looks to generate new revenue streams amid brand uncertainty over tariffs.】

item.title: 世界银行下调拉美和加勒比地区增长预期，强调不确定性
item.description: 世界银行周三将其对拉丁美洲和加勒比地区2025年经济增长的预测从1月份的2.5%下调至2.1%，称该地区经济体必须进行调整，以应对日益加剧的全球不确定性。【原文：The World Bank on Wednesday cut its 2025 economic growth forecast for Latin America and the Caribbean to 2.1% from its January forecast of 2.5%, saying regional economies must adapt to navigate increasing global uncertainties.】

item.title: 首席执行官制定新战略，Worldline推迟发布盈利指引
item.description: 法国数字支付公司 Worldline 周三表示，由于新管理层上任和全球经济波动加剧，该公司将把年度财务前景更新推迟到 7 月份。【原文：French digital payments company Worldline will postpone its annual financial outlook update until July, it said on Wednesday, citing its new management and increased global economic volatility.】

item.title: 贝森特：国际货币基金组织的格奥尔基耶娃和世界银行的班加需要赢得特朗普政府的信任
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）和世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）都是很好的领导者，但他们必须赢得特朗普政府的信任，使这些机构重新专注于其核心使命。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday that International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva and World Bank President Ajay Banga are both good leaders but they will have to earn the Trump administration's trust refocusing the institutions on their core missions.】

item.title: 贝克休斯预测关税抑制需求将导致生产商支出下降
item.description: 美国油田服务供应商贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）周三预测，由于关税削弱了需求预期并推低了原油价格，全球石油生产商的支出将大幅下降。【原文：U.S. oilfield service provider Baker Hughes on Wednesday forecast steeper drops in spending by global oil producers as tariffs dent demand expectations and push down prices for crude.】

item.title: Kering 公布第一季度销售额下降 14%，Gucci 销售额进一步下滑
item.description: 开云集团（Kering）周三公布的第一季度营收降幅超过预期，这是该奢侈品集团最新公布的一组令人失望的业绩，因为其明星品牌古驰（Gucci）在日益恶化的经济环境中继续挣扎。【原文：Kering reported on Wednesday a bigger-than-expected decline in first-quarter revenue, the latest set of disappointing results from the luxury group as its star label Gucci continues to struggle amid a worsening economic environment.】

item.title: 贝森特：中美关税必须下降才能启动贸易谈判
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，他认为中美之间过高的关税必须先降下来，然后才能进行贸易谈判。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday that he believes that excessively high tariffs between the U.S. and China will have to come down before trade negotiations can proceed.】

item.title: 解说：欧盟罚款后，苹果和 Meta 会怎样？
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周三对苹果公司 AAPL.O 和 Meta 分别处以 5 亿欧元（5.7 亿美元）和 2 亿欧元的罚款，要求这两家公司遵守《数字市场法案》，该法案旨在允许较小的竞争对手进入由最大公司主导的市场。【原文：European Union antitrust regulators on Wednesday fined Apple AAPL.O 500 million euros ($570 million) and Meta 200 million euros to make the companies comply with the Digital Markets Act, which seeks to allow smaller rivals into markets dominated by the biggest companies.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，因竞争问题，司法部正在调查迪斯尼与 FuboTV 的交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引熟悉该计划的人士的话报道称，美国司法部官员正在调查迪士尼收购流媒体公司 FuboTV 控股权的交易。【原文：Officials at the U.S. Department of Justice are probing Disney's deal to take a controlling stake in streaming company FuboTV , Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: EIA 称，美国原油库存意外增加，进口量猛增
item.description: 美国能源信息署周三表示，由于进口量猛增，上周美国原油库存意外增加，而汽油和馏分油库存的降幅均超过预期。【原文：U.S. crude oil stockpiles rose unexpectedly last week as imports jumped, while both gasoline and distillate inventories fell more than expected, the Energy Information Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司租用的运输委内瑞拉原油的油轮寻求其他业务
item.description: 消息人士称，雪佛龙公司本月租用了一些油轮将原油从委内瑞拉运往美国，但由于与制裁有关的支付不确定性，国营公司委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）取消了装货许可，并命令该公司退还货物，目前这些油轮正在其他地方以现货合同进行销售。【原文：Some tankers Chevron had chartered to move crude from Venezuela to the United States this month are now being marketed for spot contracts elsewhere, sources said, after state company PDVSA canceled loading permits and ordered the firm to return cargoes amid payment uncertainty related to sanctions.】

item.title: 对关税战和鲍威尔任期的担忧减弱，华尔街指数反弹
item.description: 周三，由于中美贸易战有望缓和，以及唐纳德-特朗普总统收回了解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的威胁，美国主要股指反弹至一周高点。【原文：The main U.S. stock indexes rallied to one-week highs on Wednesday on hopes for a de-escalation in the U.S.-China trade war and as President Donald Trump scaled back his threats to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 美国 3 月新屋销售大幅增长，供应量仍在上升
item.description: 由于购房者急于利用抵押贷款利率下降的机会，3 月份美国新建独栋住宅的销量增幅超过预期，但黯淡的经济前景对房地产市场的复苏构成了挑战。【原文：Sales of new U.S. single-family homes increased more than expected in March as buyers rushed to take advantage of a decline in mortgage rates, but a gloomy economic outlook poses a challenge to the housing market recovery.】

item.title: 美国财政部贝森特敦促国际货币基金组织和世界银行重新聚焦核心使命
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三呼吁国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）和世界银行（World Bank）重新专注于宏观经济稳定和发展的核心任务，认为它们已经过多地偏离了气候变化等虚荣项目，降低了其有效性。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday called on the International Monetary Fund and World Bank to refocus on their core missions of macroeconomic stability and development, arguing that they have strayed too far into vanity projects such as climate change that have reduced their effectiveness.】

item.title: 美国炼油企业第一季度利润可能下降，尽管利润率有所提高
item.description: 能源分析师表示，投资者预计美国顶级炼油企业将公布季度亏损报告，即使它们的利润率有所改善，因为它们要为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税带来的连锁反应做好准备。【原文：Investors are expecting top U.S. refiners to report quarterly losses, even as their margins improve, as they brace for the ripple effect from U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, energy analysts said.】

item.title: 消息人士称白宫将考虑在谈判前降低对华关税
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周三表示，白宫将考虑在与中国政府谈判之前降低进口中国商品的关税，并补充说，任何行动都将与谈判相结合，而不是单方面采取。【原文：The White House would look at lowering tariffs on imported Chinese goods pending talks with Beijing, a source familiar with the matter said on Wednesday, adding that any action would be in conjunction with negotiations and not made unilaterally.】

item.title: 高盛股东批准高管薪酬，选举董事
item.description: 高盛股东投票通过了高管首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）和总裁约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）的薪酬方案，包括高额的留任奖金。【原文：Goldman Sachs shareholders voted to approve pay packages, including hefty retention bonuses, for top executives CEO David Solomon and president John Waldron.】

item.title: 独家报道：欧佩克+将考虑在 6 月再次加速石油增产
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，欧佩克+成员国将在 6 月份连续第二个月建议加快提高石油产量。【原文：Several OPEC+ members will suggest accelerating oil output hikes in June for a second consecutive month, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：白宫考虑将对华关税降至 50-65% 之间
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，美国政府正在考虑削减对中国进口商品的关税，以缓和与中国政府的紧张关系。【原文：The U.S. government is considering cutting its tariffs on Chinese imports in a bid to de-escalate tensions with Beijing, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Meta 在欧洲扩大雷朋智能眼镜的人工智能接入范围
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周三表示，它将把雷朋智能眼镜上的人工智能助手 Meta AI 的使用范围扩大到另外七个欧洲国家。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Wednesday it is expanding access to its artificial intelligence assistant, Meta AI, on Ray-Ban smart glasses to seven additional European countries.】

item.title: 耐克为基皮耶贡争取 4 分钟一英里的目标，在鞋类科学方面寻求品牌提升
item.description: 在创新能力备受质疑之际，耐克公司周三宣布了一项帮助肯尼亚跑步巨星费丝-基普耶贡（Faith Kipyegon）实现从未有过的成就的计划：在四分钟内跑完一英里。【原文：At a time when its knack for innovation is in question, Nike on Wednesday announced a project to help Kenyan running superstar Faith Kipyegon do what no woman ever has: run a mile in under four minutes.】

item.title: 美国 4 月商业活动放缓；企业要求提高产品价格
item.description: 由于关税带来的不确定性，4月份美国商业活动放缓至16个月以来的最低点，商品和服务价格飙升，这加剧了金融市场对滞胀的担忧，可能使美联储陷入困境。【原文：U.S. business activity slowed to a 16-month low in April and prices charged for goods and services soared amid uncertainty caused by tariffs, reinforcing financial market fears of stagflation that could put the Federal Reserve in a tough spot.】

item.title: 特朗普称将起诉 Perkins Coie 律师事务所
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他将以 "恶劣和非法的行为 "为由起诉帕金斯-科埃（Perkins Coie）律师事务所，并列举了该事务所一名身份不明的成员的行为。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he was suing law firm Perkins Coie for "egregious and unlawful acts" and cited the conduct of an unidentified member of the firm.】

item.title: 越南开始与美国进行贸易谈判，46% 的巨大关税迫在眉睫，国家媒体报道
item.description: 据越南国营媒体报道，越南贸易部长周三与美国贸易代表杰米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）通了电话，开启了贸易谈判，因为美国高达46%的关税迫在眉睫，威胁到东南亚工业中心的增长。【原文：Vietnam's trade minister spoke to U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer by phone on Wednesday, state-run media reported, kicking off trade talks as whopping 46% U.S. tariffs loom, threatening growth in Southeast Asia's industrial hub.】

item.title: 软银支持的 Twenty One 与 Cantor 的 SPAC 合作，成立价值 36 亿美元的加密企业
item.description: 软银支持的加密风险投资公司 Twenty One Capital 周三表示，它已同意与空头支票工具 Cantor Equity Partners 进行业务合并，交易金额为 36 亿美元。【原文：SoftBank-backed crypto venture Twenty One Capital said on Wednesday it has agreed for a business combination with blank-check vehicle Cantor Equity Partners in a $3.6 billion deal.】

item.title: Enverus公司称，油价疲软、页岩耕地面积有限将影响2025年的能源并购
item.description: 分析公司 Enverus 周三表示，随着油价下滑和优质耕地减少，美国上游油气勘探开发市场正准备迎接自 COVID-19 大流行以来最具挑战性的局面，尽管上一季度交易量跃升至 2018 年以来第二好的开局。【原文：The U.S. upstream oil and gas M&A market is bracing for the most challenging conditions since the COVID-19 pandemic as oil prices slump and prime acreage dries up, analytics firm Enverus said on Wednesday, even though dealmaking jumped last quarter to the second-best start to the year since 2018.】

item.title: 巴西 Voepass 航空公司申请破产，将财务困境归咎于 LATAM 航空公司
item.description: 根据法院文件，巴西私营航空公司 Voepass 于周二晚些时候申请破产保护，称总部设在智利的 LATAM 航空公司的行为是造成其财务危机的主要原因。【原文：Brazil's Voepass, a privately held airline, filed for bankruptcy protection late on Tuesday according to court documents, citing the actions of Chile-based LATAM Airlines as a major reason for its financial crisis.】

item.title: LTIMindtree 因医疗保健业务疲软，季度收入略低于预期
item.description: 印度第 6 大软件服务出口商 LTIMindtree 周三的季度收益略低于预期，原因是其医疗保健和消费部门的收入下降。【原文：India's No.6 software services exporter LTIMindtree on Wednesday marginally missed quarterly earnings estimates due to a revenue decline in its healthcare and consumer segments.】

item.title: 安费诺预测本季度电子工具需求增长强劲，股价大涨
item.description: 电子设备制造商安费诺（Amphenol）周三预测第二季度业绩将高于华尔街预期，押注于数据通信和国防市场需求的增长，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 12%。【原文：Electronics equipment maker Amphenol forecast second quarter results above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on growing demand in data communications and defense markets, sending its shares up 12% in premarket trading.】
